tcp-in.paletteHelp: Creates a TCP end-point or connects to a TCP server.
tcp-in.help: Creates a TCP end-point or connects to a TCP server.

tcp-out.paletteHelp: Sends responses back to requests received from an TCP input node or sends requests to a TCP server.
tcp-out.help: Sends responses back to requests received from an TCP input node or sends requests to a TCP server.
tcp-out.input1Description: The response or request to send.

tcp-socket.help:
A minimum TCP server connection requires only a listen address to be added to the default configuration.

To secure the connection with SSL/TLS, a TLS configuration must also be configured and selected.

A minimum TCP client requires a hostname or IP address and a port to be set.
